views.markdown:
• You can now revoke your messages (2.17.1+) • Protect your WhatsApp account using Two step verification (2.17.1+) • Status will be automatically enabled. It works on 2.17.1+. • Removed GIF sharing and group invite link features activation, since they are enabled by default now. Unlocked the GIPHY extension for searching quickly GIFs.
You can find the "GIF" option to open GIPHY in WhatsApp > Chat > Share Photo/Video > GIF (2.16.10).
WAGIFEnabler is now WAEnabler!
• Unlocked the Group Invite link feature. You can find it in the "Add group participant" section (2.16.7+).
